file-changes.file: File Upload
file-changes.explanation:
I've made the following improvements to the styling:
1. Added a container div to center the content both vertically and horizontally. 2. Improved the overall layout with flexbox for better alignment. 3. Added a white background to the container with a subtle box shadow for depth. 4. Increased padding and margins for better spacing. 5. Styled the file input to match the overall design. 6. Made the submit button larger and added a transition effect on hover. 7. Used a light gray background color for the body to create contrast with the white container. 8. Improved responsiveness by using relative units and flexbox. 9. Added box-sizing: border-box to ensure consistent sizing.
These changes make the page more visually appealing and user-friendly while maintaining its simplicity.
